name: Messa Shooter
description:
play only on full screen do to interface of the screen

Have fun on the game and the direction is on the game but in case problems occur 

w - forward

s- back

 a - left

d - right

their is shooting like an fps which is left click to fire and a crosshair to aim

 i was working on a desktop so it may look different on mac and the first level is a bit glitchy due to something that occured and tutorial work perfectly
